text: I remember finding this game scary 20 years ago when I was a kid because of all the monsters and its dark atmosphere. I spent so much time just trying to beat the first stage, this theme is pretty much ingrained into my brain. It's pretty cool how Firebrand, the main protagonist, starred in his own games.
